about_the_game:
About the Game


A mood heavy action-adventure, Unbroken takes players on a grindhouse journey to Crests Edge in search of the traitor Nielsen. With multiple routes to achieve your goal (or even abandon it), the ascent to one of the multiple endings will be a memorable one.

With a unique lore structure and one of a kind audio visual composition, Unbroken will take players on a trip.

Notable Features Include:

  • A unique gameplay flow and vibe. Project Downfall players ought to feel right at home.

  • A large realm to discover, with its own social structure and customs: choose and forge your own path through Crests Edge.

  • Brutal, Tarantino grindhouse'esque over the top visceral bursts of violence. String your combos in a brief and stylish ballet of death before moving on to the next one.

  • The Resin: the potent oils will grant you bullet time in varying forms. Use them wisely, applying the right resin at the right moment can be a matter of life and death

  • The resin kick: give your enemies a free flying lesson or turn multiple inanimate objects into deadly large caliber projectiles.

  • Classist based lore. With ascension into the realm of Crests Edge,players will witness and evolution of technology, style, language, architecture and more

  • choices matter: with a timeline that progresses with gameplay, events and backstory evolves based on players actions and related powerplay happening in the background.

  • A jazzpunk Original Dynamic Soundtrack by Roland Redwood (previous works include Sinless, Project Downfall)

  • Punch through system: combat will be juicy with volumetric blood splashing in all directions, and see through holes ripping through your enemies directly in point of projectile entry.

Enter Crests Edge,


The trail has led you to the kingdom spanning out to the North, far away from your homeland.

Your word is your bond. You will track down the traitor Nielsen who is seeking refuge somewhere in the realm of Crests Edge and bring him to justice. Dead or alive.

But be wary, Stranger: the realm is now engulfed in chaos. Along with the Feast of the 3rd Moon and the ongoing Earls Rebellion your journey will not be for the faint of heart. You will have 5 full moons to complete your quest. The clock is ticking!

You will prevail. Take up your arms and go forth and uphold the honour of our crest.

I Will Pray Day and Night For Your Safe Return...

Crests Edge


The realm of Crests Edge is a large and diverse one. Featuring many biomes, classes and so forth, you will get to experience how the Township evolves with your ascension to your goal.

For it is worth noting: due to the severe case of classism in the realm, you will witness stark contrasts both in techonoligal advancement, architecture, style and attire as well as attitude and language of the characters you come across.

The lowest-poorest regions are similar to those of medieval times, whereas the higher you get the larger the technological gaps become. With the richest regions being more akin to industrial victorian / WW1 times.

Westfall Style


The games style is a next gen re-imagining of classic sprite based FPP games such as Tekwar, Disruptor(ps1), Witchhaven etc, whilst aiming for an interpretation of how one would remember these games through rose tinted glasses. So keeping the sprite retro aesthetic, whilst bringing it into modern times with advanced shaders and lighting, physics and ragdolls, destructible environements and in synch with the dynamic jazzpunk OST, Unbroken is sure to leave an impression.

---

  • Will you remain unbroken?

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent bursts of violent action, self-medication, mature language and themes.

  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 260 or ATI/AMD Radeon HD5670

  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
